SEARCH
Package util

Interface ActionHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicantActionHandler, ManagerActionHandler, OfficerActionHandler
public interface ActionHandler
Interface representing a generic action handler for different user roles. It provides methods to handle user actions related to projects, enquiries, and filtering.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    User
    handleAction(int choice, User user, Scanner sc, UserDatabase db)
    Handles a user action selected from the main menu based on the choice number.
    void
    handleEnquiryAction(int choice, User currentUser, Scanner sc)
    Handles actions related to enquiries submitted by or for the user.
    default void
    handleFilterAction(User currentUser, Scanner sc)
    Handles filtering actions for the current user.
    void
    handleProjectAction(int choice, User currentUser, Scanner sc)
    Handles actions related to project management for the current user.

  • Method Details

    • handleFilterAction

      default void handleFilterAction(User currentUser, Scanner sc)
      Handles filtering actions for the current user. Prompts the user to select a filter option and sets it.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - The user performing the action
      sc - Scanner object for reading input

    • handleAction

      User handleAction(int choice, User user, Scanner sc, UserDatabase db)
      Handles a user action selected from the main menu based on the choice number.
      Parameters:
      choice - The user's chosen menu option
      user - The user performing the action
      sc - Scanner object for reading input
      db - The database used to read or update user-related data
      Returns:
      The updated User object, or null if the session ends

    • handleEnquiryAction

      void handleEnquiryAction(int choice, User currentUser, Scanner sc)
      Handles actions related to enquiries submitted by or for the user.
      Parameters:
      choice - The selected enquiry option
      currentUser - The user performing the enquiry-related action
      sc - Scanner object for reading input

    • handleProjectAction

      void handleProjectAction(int choice, User currentUser, Scanner sc)
      Handles actions related to project management for the current user.
      Parameters:
      choice - The selected project-related menu option
      currentUser - The user performing the project-related action
      sc - Scanner object for reading input
